sig_info: Iron Man overloads the Arc Reactor in his chest if Health drops below 15%, briefly extending his life span with a burst of 269.25 to 578.56 Health.
While in Arc Overload, Iron Man also gains an Armor Up for 6 seconds, increasing his Armor Rating by 533.33 to 1857.18.
